calculations.name: Comparison date
calculations.tableau_expression: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [MAX_DATE -1day] ELSE  [Parameters].[Date X (comparison date)] END

calculation_context.Expression: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [MAX_DATE -1day] ELSE  [Parameters].[Date X (comparison date)] END

calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date])
when 1 then [Max Date]-2
when 2 then [Max Date]-3
else [Max Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
